x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.potential_impact: Streamlined volunteer support processes, faster onboarding, and better resource management.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Large volunteer organizations lack an ITSM-style helpdesk for managing volunteer requests, onboarding, and issue resolution.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A ServiceNow ITSM-based portal for volunteers to raise tickets (e.g., access requests, equipment needs, event queries). It can include knowledge articles, chatbots, and SLA-based resolution tracking.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

ITSM

Knowledge Management

Virtual Agent

Service Portal/Catalog

HR or CRM data integration for volunteer user profiles.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Adapting ITSM workflows to non-IT volunteer contexts.
